comment.text: The translation key "Share" is used to display a button label in the user interface. It appears on a shared form panel and is linked to an icon representing sharing. The purpose of this text is to enable users to share content.

usage.context:
onClose={onCancel}
 displayType={ModalDialogType.aside}
 withBodyScroll
 withBorder
 >
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("Common:Share")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <StyledWrapper>
 <div className="share-file_body">
 <Share
 infoPanelSelection={fileInfo}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation 'Համօգտագործել' (Hamogtavorzel) translates to 'use together' or 'co-use,' which doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Share.' 'Share' implies distributing or making something available to others, not just using it jointly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Տարածել' (Taratsel - 'Distribute'), 'Բաժանել' (Bajanel - 'Divide/Share'), or 'Հետաքրքրել' (Hetakrerqel - 'To make available'). The best option depends on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Russian translation "Доступ" (Dostup) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Share" in this context. "Share" implies distributing or making something available to others, while "Доступ" primarily means 'access'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translations like "Поделиться" (Poderitsya - to share) or "Распространить" (Rasprostranit' - to distribute) depending on the specific nuance of 'Share' that's intended.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian (Latin) translation "Deli" does not accurately convey the meaning of "Share". "Deli" means 'divides' or 'cuts', while 'Share' implies providing something to others.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Podeli" (to share), "Dajte" (give), or "Udelite" (distribute), depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Надати спільний доступ' is a valid translation for 'Share', it's quite formal and lengthy. A more common and natural translation for 'Share' in many contexts would be 'Поділитися'.
